title: Schema Browser Panel
description: Build a sidebar/panel showing all tables and views. Click to expand and see columns, data types, and row counts. Click a table name to insert it into the SQL editor. Group items by category: dimension tables, fact tables, analytics views. Include search/filter within the schema browser. Consumes table_metadata.json from TKT-A. Depends on TKT-B for runtime and TKT-C for editor integration.
